page.title: 04CLUBS IN E. CORNWALL
page.content: There are no clubs in SOUTH HILL.The clubs listed are therefore at STOKE CLIMSLAND village using the Duchy Hall there as a base.A variety of indoor and outdoor activities are covered from 8 years old upwards. All three major political parties are represented. Other clubs are: A.R.C. Meets for fund raising Allergy Group - Monthly meeting British Legion Womens'Section - Monthly Meeting. Mother and Baby Group ) Meet weekly Mother and Toddler Group ) Parent Teachers Association Monthly Youth Club - Meets weekly and also sponsors a weekly Karate evening. The Sports Club'S site is at Venterdon (SEE RECREATION).For five years this has been used by Tamar Valleey Motor Cycle Club's Annual Rally bringing guests from all opver Britain.
